wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[3 January|3]]''' - [[Birthday Toast]].
* '''[[9 January|9]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: Conquest]]'' is released in Europe.
* '''[[13 January|13]]''' - ''The Lord of the Rings: Conquest'' is released in North America.
* '''[[26 January|26]]''' - ''[[Black & White Ogre Country]]'' is published.

==March==
* '''[[15 March|15]]''' - ''[[Arda Reconstructed: The Creation of the Published Silmarillion]]'' is published.
* '''[[17 March|17]]''' - The seventh book of ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Mines of Moria]]'', "Leaves of Lórien", is released.

==April==
* '''[[1 April|1]]''' - ''[[War of the Ring (2009 book)|The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game: War of the Ring]]'' is published.
* '''[[4 April|4]]''' - The Fourth Grand Council of the [[Sociedad Tolkien Peruana]] is held in [[wikipedia:Lima|Lima, Peru]].
* '''[[19 April|19]]''' - The first e-Book of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', ''[[The Hobbit]]'' and ''[[The Children of Húrin]]'' are published.
* '''[[28 April|28]]''' - ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien (1997 documentary)]]'' is released on DVD.
==May==
* '''[[3 May|3]]''' - ''[[The Hunt for Gollum]]'', Chris Bouchard's fan film, is released online.
* '''[[5 May|5]]''' - ''[[The Legend of Sigurd and Gudrún]]'' is published.
* '''[[7 May|7]]''' - ''[[Cinematic Scripture: The Structure and Usage of The Lord of the Rings as Equipment for Living]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - [[Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment]] takes the license from [[Middle-earth Enterprises|Saul Zaentz Company]] to produce video games.

==June==
* '''[[2 June|2]]''' - The Deluxe Edition of ''[[The Legend of Sigurd and Gudrún]]'' is published.
* '''[[11 June|11]]''' - ''[[The Road Goes Ever On and On: The Map of Tolkien's Middle-earth]]'' is published.
* '''[[17 June|17]]''' - ''[[The Hobbitonian Anthology‎]]'' is published.
* '''[[22 June|22]]''' - ''[[Tolkien's Bag End]]'' is published.
* '''[[23 June|23]]''' - The eighth book of ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Mines of Moria]]'', "Scourge of Khazad-dûm", is released.
* '''[[30 June|30]]''' - ''[[Languages, Myths and History]]'' is published.

==July==
* '''[[1 July|1]]''' - The [[Tolkien Calendar 2010]] and [[Tolkien Diary 2010]] are published.
* '''[[6 July|6]]''' - ''[[The Epic Realm of Tolkien|The Epic Realm of Tolkien: Part One: Beren and Lúthien]]'' is published.
* '''[[17 July|17]]-[[20 July|20]]''' - [[Mythcon 40]].
* '''[[21 July|21]]''' - Artist [[Heinz Edelmann]] dies.
* '''[[24 July|24]]-[[26 July|26]]''' - [[Tolkien Thing]] 2009.

==August==
* '''[[7 August|7]]''' - At Montreal's WorldCon, ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' wins the 2009 Prometheus Hall of Fame Award for the best classic literary work of liberty.
* '''[[6 August|6]]-[[9 August|9]]''' - [[Omentielva|Omentielva Nelya]] - 3rd International Conference on [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s Invented Languages in Whitehaven, England

==September==
* '''[[1 September|1]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Films]]'' is published.
* '''[[8 September|8]]''' - ''[[Halifirien: The Hallowed Mountain]]'' is released online.
* '''[[8 September|8]]''' - The [[Tolkien Estate]], [[The Tolkien Trust]] and [[HarperCollins]] settle their lawsuit with [[New Line Cinema]] and the [[Saul Zaentz Company]].
* '''[[22 September|22]]''' - The Frisian translation of ''[[The Hobbit]]'', by [[Anne Tjerk Popkema]], is published.
* '''[[25 September|25]]-[[27 September|27]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 2009]].

==October==
* '''[[2 October|2]]-[[4 October|4]]''' - [[Ring*Con 2009]].
* '''[[3 October|3]]''' - Author [[Gisbert Kranz]] dies.
* '''[[5 October|5]]''' - [[wikipedia:History (TV channel)|The History Channel]] airs ''[[Tolkien's Monsters]]''.
* '''[[14 October|14]]''' - Actor [[Martyn Sanderson]] dies.
* '''[[15 October|15]]-[[18 October|18]]''' - Mereth Aderthad XV, or "EstelCon", in [[wikipedia:Cardona, Spain|Cardona]], [[wikipedia:Spain|Spain]].
* '''[[16 October|16]]''' - Voice actor [[Denys Hawthorne]] dies.
* '''[[27 October|27]]''' - Fantasy novel ''[[The Shadow Dragons]]'', featuring [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] as a fictional character, is published.

==November==
* '''[[6 November|6]]'''- The [[wikipedia:Facebook|Facebook]] application ''[[The One Ring (Facebook application)|The One Ring]]'' is launched.
* '''[[23 November|23]]''' - ''[[Parma Eldalamberon]] [[Parma Eldalamberon 18|#18]]'' is published.
==December==
* '''[[1 December|1]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Siege of Mirkwood]]'' is  released in North America.
* '''[[1 December|1]]''' - ''[[Born of Hope]]'' is released online.
* '''[[3 December|3]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Siege of Mirkwood]]'' is  released in Europe.
* '''[[22 December|22]]''' - ''[[War of the Fantasy Worlds]]'' is published.

==?==
* '''(spring)''' - [[Mallorn 47|''Mallorn'' 47]] is published.
* '''(autumn)''' - [[Mallorn 48|''Mallorn'' 48]] is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Tolkien Studies: Volume 6]]'' is published.

{{years|2006|2007|2008|2009|2010|2011|2012}}
